content.question: Prosper Company is a profit-maximizing monopoly producing toy cubes. Prosper Company is currently earning positive economic profit. Which of the following combinations of events will definitely cause Prosper Companyâ€™s profit to increase?

choices.label: A decrease in demand for toy cubes and a decrease in fixed costs to produce toy cubes
A decrease in demand for toy cubes and an increase in fixed costs to produce toy cubes
A decrease in demand for toy cubes and a decrease in variable costs to produce toy cubes
An increase in demand for toy cubes and an increase in government subsidies to produce toy cubes
An increase in demand for toy cubes and an increase in fixed costs to produce toy cubes

content.answer: An increase in demand for toy cubes and an increase in government subsidies to produce toy cubes

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs when there are multiple contributing variables, or what multiple actions should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
